Verses: 1 sEnaigaLaiyudaiya nagaramE, ippOdhu thaNduthaNdaagak koodikkoL; namakku virOdhamaaga mutrikkai pOdappadum; iSravEludaiya nyaayaadhipadhiyaik kOlinaal kannaththilE adippaargaL.

2 eppiraaththaa ennappatta bethlagEmE, nee yoodhEyaaviluLLa aayirangaLukkuLLE siRiyadhaayirundhum, iSravElai aaLappOgiRavar unnidaththilirundhu puRappattu ennidaththil varuvaar; avarudaiya puRappadudhal anaadhi naatkaLaagiya poorvaththinudaiyadhu.
3 aanaalum prasavikkiRavaL prasavikkiRamattum avargaLai oppukkoduppaar; appozhudhu avarudaiya sagOdhararil meedhiyaanavargaL iSravEl puththirarOdunkoodath thirumbuvaargaLï¿½.

4 avar nindrukoNdu, karththarudaiya balaththOdum thammudaiya dhEvanaagiya karththarudaiya naamaththin magaththuvaththOdum mEyppaar; aagaiyaal avargaL nilaiththiruppaargaL; avar ini boomiyin ellaigaL pariyandhamum magimaippaduvaar.

5 ivarE samaadhaana kaaraNar; aseeriyan nammudaiya dhEsaththilE varumpOdhum, nammudaiya araNmanaigaLai midhikkumpOdhum, Ezhu mEypparaiyum manusharil ettu adhipadhigaLaiyum avanukku virOdhamaaga niRuththuvEn.

6 ivargaL aseeriyaa dhEsaththaiyum, nimrOdhin dhEsaththaiyum, adhinudaiya vaasalgaLukku utpuRamaagap pattayaththiRku iraiyaakkuvaargaL; aseeriyan nammudaiya dhEsaththil varumpOdhum, nammudaiya ellaigaLai midhikkumpOdhum avanukku nammaith thappuvippaar.

7 yaakkObilE meedhiyaanavargaL karththaraalE varugiRa paniyaippOlavum, manushanukkuk kaaththiraamalum, manupuththirarukkuth thaamadhiyaamalum, pooNdugaLmEl varugiRa mazhaigaLaippOlavum, anEga janangaLin naduvilE iruppaargaL.

8 yaakkObilE meedhiyaanavargaL, singam kaattumirugangaLukkuLLE irukkiRadhaRku samaanamaagavum, kadandhupOi midhiththuth thappuvippaarillaamal peeRippOdugiRa paalasingam aattumandhaigaLukkuLLE irukkiRadhaRku samaanamaagavum jaadhigaLukkuL anEga janangaLin naduvilE iruppaargaL.
9 unnudaiya kai un virOdhigaLinmEl uyarum; un saththurukkaLellaarum sangarikkappaduvaargaL.
10 annaaLilE naan un kudhiraigaLai un naduvil iraadhapadikku sangariththu, un radhangaLai azhiththu,
11 un dhEsaththup pattaNangaLai sangariththu, un araNgaLaiyellaam nirmoolamaakki,
12 sooniya viththaigaL un kaiyil iraadhapadikku agatruvEn; naaL paarkkiRavargaL unnidaththil illaamaRpOvaargaL;
13 un suroobpangaLaiyum un silaigaLaiyum un naduvil iraadhapadikku nirmoolamaakkuvEn; un kaiyin kiriyaiyai nee inip paNindhukoLLaai.
14 naan un vikkiragaththOppugaLai un naduvil iraadhapadikkup pidungi, un pattaNangaLai azhiththu,
15 sevikodaadha puRajaadhigaLidaththilE kObaththOdum ukkiraththOdum needhiyai sarikkattuvEn endraar.
